醊字的基本解释

醊
zhuì
祭祀时把酒洒在地上：“男女老壮皆相与赋敛，致奠醊以千数。”
连续祭祀：“八陛，陛五十八醊，合四百六十四醊。”

醊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuì］
［《廣韻》陟衛切，去祭，知。］
［《廣韻》陟劣切，入薛，知。］
(1)祭祀时以酒酹地，祭奠。
(2)连续祭祀。

醊字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醊； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1284第25
【唐韻】陟劣切【集韻】株劣切【正韻】朱劣切，?音叕。【玉篇】今作餟。祭酹也。亦作?。【廣韻】醊，連祭也。【集韻】酹謂之醊。【史記·封禪書】其下四方地爲祿食。【註】索隱曰：餟，謂聮續而祭之。正義曰：謂繞壇設諸神祭座相聮綴也。　【古詩·祠洛水歌】洛濱醊禱，色連三光。　又【廣韻】陟衞切【集韻】株衞切【正韻】之瑞切，?音綴。義同。

醊字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous rice
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous rice
zhuì
Sprinkle wine on the ground during the sacrifice: "Men, women, old men and strong men and women are in harmony with each other, resulting in thousands of liquors."
Continuous sacrifice: "Eight sire, sire fifty-eight 醊, a total of four hundred and sixty-four 醊."
Glutinous rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuì］
["Guang Yun" Zhi Wei cut, go to sacrifice, know. ]
["Guang Yun" Zhi is inferior, enters Xue, knows. ]
(1) When offering sacrifices, use wine to sing the ground for memorial service.
(2) Continuous sacrifices.
Glutinous rice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　醊; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1284 Page 25
【Tang Yun】Zhi bad cut 【Ji Yun】Zhong bad cut 【Zheng Yun】Zhu bad cut,? Sound. [Jade articles] This is the work. Sacrifice also. Also for?. [Guangyun] 醊, even offerings. 【Jiyun】The 酹 is called 醊. 【Historical Records · Feng Chan Book】The four places under it are Lu Shi. [Note] Suo Yin said: 餟, that is to continue and sacrifice. Zhengyi said: It is said that the sacrificial seats of the gods are set up around the altar to adorn each other.　[Ancient Poetry·Ancestral Luoshui Song] Luo Binli prays, color and three lights.　[Guangyun] Zhiweiqie [Jiyun] Zhuweiqie [Zhengyun] Ruiqie,? Sound embellishment. The same meaning.

zhuì, chuò
* гл.
1) рит. совершать возлияние вином; возлияние (жертвенное)
奠醊 делать возлияние
2) рит. приносить общую жертву (сразу многим божествам)
醊食 совершать общее жертвоприношение
